metadata.name: LiveKD Kernel Memory Dump File Created
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a file that has the same name as the default LiveKD kernel memory dump.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(file.path) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\livekd.dmp'))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a file that has the same name as the default LiveKD kernel memory dump.

metadata.objective: False positive: In rare occasions administrators might leverage LiveKD to perform live kernel debugging. This should not be allowed on production systems. Investigate and apply additional filters where necessary. Reference: Internal Research
